mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (title, stock_id, stock_code, news_url, published_date, name) VALUES (#{title}, #{stockId}, #{stockCode}, #{newsUrl}, #{publishedDate}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM news WHERE news_url = #{newsUrl}
SELECT news_id, title, stock_code, news_url, published_date, name FROM news ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT #{limit}
